mean_cn: adj. 残忍成性的；虐待狂的
mean_en: deriving pleasure or sexual gratification from inflicting pain on another
sentence: My doctor was smiling through the entire prostate exam! I swear, he's sadistic!
sentence_trans: 我的医生在整个前列腺检查过程中都在笑，我敢说他是个虐待狂！
word_etyma: sad悲伤 ＋ istic有...性质的 → 让人非常悲伤的 → sadistic虐待狂的，残酷成性的
